Text:
Here are the audio books by BBC:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6111884/CommentDiv

Many thank DittlyDoo.

Look forward to viewing the videos. To be honest I didn't even know they existed.

Sorry, episode 3 (Curse of the Golden Cross) is missing the ending.  Don't bother to download it.  I did these dvd's in batch mode on Handbrake and am very disappointed that I/it made several mistakes in my recent uploads.  Be sure to check all your files when using Handbrake for errors before you think they are good - my new lesson learned.
